frameset.edef: to run a place or work, to take care of (Egyption, Iraqi)
to make other accept or believe a lie, to make things pass on others

example.parse: TOP (UCP (S (VP (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يِمْشُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:3FS ها)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NP (NP (DET+NOUN العالَم)) (NP (NOUN_QUANT كُلّ) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه)))))))) (CONJ بَسّ) (FRAG (NP (DET+NOUN العَرَب)) (INTJ (NEG_PART لا)))))

(TOP (S (S (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ إِن) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (PP-PRD (PREP فِي) (NP (PRON_3MS ُه))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN تَواطُؤ))))) (PRT (CONJ فَ)) (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS دَه)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC غالِباً)) (NP-PRD (NOUN تَواطُؤ) (ADJ داخِلِي)) (PP-PRP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN شَأْن) (S (VP (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يِمَشُّوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الجَنْزُورِيّ)) (CONJ أَو) (NP (NOUN وَزِير) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الداخْلِيَّة))))))))) (CONJ وَ) (S (PP (PREP فِي) (NP (NOUN_QUANT كُلّ) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL الحالات)))) (NP-TPC-1 (NP (PRT (CONJ لا)) (DET+NOUN الجَيش)) (CONJ وَ) (NP (PRT (CONJ لا)) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الحُكُومَة))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانِت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG مَسْؤُولَة) (NP-ADV (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC جِنائِيّاً)) (PP (NP (X (NO_FUNC عنه))))))) (PUNC .)
